title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of the European Central Bank is Christine Lagarde, previously the chair and managing director of the International Monetary Fund.

title: European Parliament wins chance of bigger say in ECB vice president race – POLITICO
snippet: December 9, 2025 5:45 pm CET · By Carlo Boffa and Giovanna Faggionato · The European Parliament could have an early say in the race for the European Central Bank vice presidency, a win for lawmakers after years of pushing for more influence over the EU’s top appointments.
